name: Movie Studio Project Backup
summary: Learn about .MV_ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Movie Studio (formerly Movie Edit Pro) is a video editor for Windows designed primarily to edit and share home movies. In the software, you can specify the backup interval in the System Settings window (File → Settings → Program... → System.
Movie Studio saves MV_ backup files in the following directory: C:\​Users\​[User}\​Documents\​MAGIX\​Movie Studio [version]

instructions: You can open MV_ files with MAGIX Movie Studio in Windows. To restore a movie from an MV_ file, select File → Load Backup Movie.

MAGIX Movie Studio can convert MV_ files to various file types after restoring them as MVP projects. After restoring them, Movie Studio can convert the MVP files (select File → Export movie) to the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
